column5: Colchester Marina is open & the Jumbo Perch are hitting Arts Bait & Tackle has minnows. Fish are at the mile marker (Grecien Shoal) The odd Walleye are also being caught have a good one EH!!! PS Arts phone number is 1-519-738-1117

has the water been rough? i 'm dying to get out there, but man the winds seem to really be kicking up lately, and coming from teh south i'm a little leary of going all the way out to colchester only to find 6 foot waves.
